findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables are not defined as `immutable`, which can reduce the amount of storage and computation required by the contract, making it more gas-efficient.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code is present in the contract, which can make it more difficult to understand and maintain, and increase the size of the contract and deployment cost.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are missing proper checks for zero values, which can lead to problems when the contract is executed.
